name: UpdateUserInterviewEnvironment
description:
Update environment details for a user interview.

Use this tool to update specific environment details of a user interview by specifying the project and interview IDs.

parameters.name: user_interview_id
parameters.description: A UUID string that uniquely identifies the user interview to be updated.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this user interview.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project for accessing environment details. Obtain by calling /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: user_interview_update_details
parameters.description: A JSON object with details to update the user interview. Includes 'id', 'created_by', 'created_at', 'interviewee_emails', 'transcript', 'summary', and 'audio'.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this user interview.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this user interview.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
